attributes.additional_details:
The European Union is slowly becoming too much of a Federal State with a European Parliament and European Commission far too powerful than it should be.

The EU (or European Communities as it was originally) was founded as a free trade organisation, for the countries to work together for the greater good and to stop a third world war taking place in Europe.

Now the EU is moving towards banking and political union and a federalised state, weakening the member states.

Britain is better off in the European Union, but we must resist the single currency, and we must resist a full political and monetary union which basically means a Federal State by the back door.

A federal Europe (even if Britain left) would be damaging to Britain, the European countries and the entire world.

It must be blocked.
